Hi, I'm Michiko Taguchi

Web developer

About me

I'm seeking a new opportunity to work as a front end developer. Until three years ago, I didn't even know how to use a command line. To implement automation at work, I started learning Python at first. The moment the automation was successful, I got goosebumps, which made me want to continue learning and gaining more technical skills.

To fully understand OOP, I also learned Java. Additionally, I learned basic data structure and SQL. To apply what I learned, I created two web applications: one with Python, Flask and PostgreSQL and another with Java, Spring and PostgreSQL. However, I got frustrated by the fact that I hardly knew anything about the front end. So, then I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React and created more web applications.

When coding web applications, I get so immersed, I even forget to eat sometimes. I would be extremely happy if I can use this passion for development to make a living. I am able to learn new things quickly and I also have good people skills. I am confident that I will be a great asset to your organization!

About education

I have a bachelor's degree in Economics and Political Science from Meiji University, Tokyo Japan and two master's degrees in MBA and Translation. My MBA is from Sasin Graduate Institute of Business Administration of Chulalongkorn University, Bangkok Thailand. And I got another master from Middlebury Institute of International Studies at Monterey, California, USA. To acquire technical skills, I took about 30 Udemy online courses and watched a lot of YouTube tutorial videos.

About activity

I love hiking with my friends. Hiking is the best way to mingle with other people and work out. It is super fun to have lunch in a beautiful natural setting with my friends. For my regular worktout, I usually run 5.5 miles each morning. This gives me a lot of energy and discipline.

In 2019, I ran a marathon for the first time in my life. This was quite a good experience. While running, my mind often wanders to think about coding, though.

My Projects

Meditation World

This website is for meditation. Users can select a duration and sound.

Favorite Places In Japan

This is a MERN project. Users can share their favorite places in Japan.

Weather App

This is a simple weather app. The default is set to New York City and Imperial Unit.
Users can change the location and units.
I used Local Storage to save the location and unit that users select.

Shoe Wonder

This site was created by Commerce.js, React, React-material, and Stripe.
I deployed on Netlify.

Ken Collage Art

This is a website to sell digital art, created by React, Redux, Firebase.

Trivia-Quiz

This is the trivia quiz website. I get all quizes using API. Users can select number of questions, category and difficulty.
